resources.name: participantByNumber
profileConsent
resources.description:
## Response

Authorization to read and transmit data is based on affirmative Consent of the associated Participant.

###Profile with consent include:
1. pid
1. alias
1. participant_name_first
1. participant_name_last
1. participant_email_primary
1. participant_phone_primary
1. values (contact, demographic and characteristic blocks. Exclude demo_ssn field)

###Profile without consent include:
1. pid
1. alias
1. participant_name_first
1. participant_name_last
1. participant_email_primary
1. participant_phone_primary



resources.name: user
resources.description:
## Global variable: user

How to use the "User" context variable?

	// fileName.js
	import { UserContext } from "./context/userContext"

	export default function Demo() {
		const user = useContext(UserContext)
	}


__Attributes:__
- uid: Unique identifier for the staff.
- status: Current staff status (ACTIVE, INACTIVE).
- user_name_first: Staff member name.
- user_name_las: Staff member last name.
- user_role: Role identifier in the current organization.
- user_role_name: Role name in the current organization.
- environment: Staff Member Access Level (Both, Backend, Frontend).
- enterprise_id: Current enterprise id.
- organization_id: Current organization id.
- token: JWT access token.
- current_participant_id: Current participant.

__Functions:__
- current_participant_id: Method to change the current participant.

### Example:

	uid:"39GUWXZZLsQzp9pzS8t9F8SN5Xo2"
	status:"ACTIVE"
	user_name_first:"Christopher"
	user_name_last:"Hart"
	user_role:1
	user_role_name:"app-manager"
	environment:"both"
	enterprise_id:"849b106ec8194bf48cdb23e19b2e9004"
	organization_id:"849b106ec8194bf48cdb23e19b2e9004"
	token:"eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJ1aWQiOiIzOUdVV1haWkxzUXpwOXB6Uzh0OUY4U041WG8yIiwib3JnYW5pemF0aW9uX2lkIjoiODQ5YjEwNmVjODE5NGJmNDhjZGIyM2UxOWIyZTkwMDQiLCJvcmdhbml6YXRpb25fbmFtZSI6IlBSSU1FIE9yZWdvbiIsInVzZXJfcm9sZV9uYW1lIjoiYXBwLW1hbmFnZXIiLCJ1c2VyX3JvbGUiOjEsImlhdCI6MTY1ODI1MzIwMiwiZXhwIjoxNjU4MzM5NjAyfQ.4PYw1bukCRlRUaNrNE4J0rGJPLmUjIV7UdAsFDJ_2og"
	current_participant_id:null
	setParticipant:"ƒ setParticipant() {}"

resources.name: React Context API
resources.description: The React Context API is a way for a React app to effectively produce global variables that can be passed around. This is the alternative to "prop drilling" or moving props from grandparent to child to parent, and so on.
